findings.message:
Reentrancy in EtherBank.withdrawBalance() (etherbank.sol#18-23):
	External calls:
	- ! (msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (etherbank.sol#21)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- userBalances[msg.sender] = 0 (etherbank.sol#22)
	EtherBank.userBalances (etherbank.sol#9) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- EtherBank.addToBalance() (etherbank.sol#14-16)
	- EtherBank.getBalance(address) (etherbank.sol#10-12)
	- EtherBank.withdrawBalance() (etherbank.sol#18-23)
findings.name: reentrancy-eth

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected THROW (etherbank.sol#21):
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.0 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder
	- ZeroFunctionSelector
	- DelegateCallReturnValue
	- ECRecoverMalformedInput
	- SkipEmptyStringLiteral
	- ConstantOptimizerSubtraction
	- IdentityPrecompileReturnIgnored
	- HighOrderByteCleanStorage
	- OptimizerStaleKnowledgeAboutSHA3
	- LibrariesNotCallableFromPayableFunctions.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.0 (etherbank.sol#7)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version
